description: A traditional Asian sharing dish with garden fresh vegetables, lamb and a beef stock based hotpot.
keywords: Soup,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Mushroom,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lamb & Potato Chinese Hotpot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your hot pot by placing a suitable heating element in the centre of the table and place a large broth pot on the heat.
Add all of your broth ingredients to the pot and bring to the bowl, then bring to a simmer for 20 minutes.
While the broth is simmering, prepare the table with all of the rest of the ingredients placed out on individual serving dishes.
Heat up a non-stick pan and fry the diced lamb for 8 minutes turning occasionally and then remove from the pan and place on a serving dish.
Once the broth is ready, each diner can add whatever ingredients they would like to cook into the hotpot and eat when desired.
